title: What's The Dumbest Reason You Broke Up With Someone?
description:
They seemed like a good catch until they did something to turn you off. Maybe they chewed too loud, maybe their toes are too long, or maybe they don't like tacos. Looking back, you know you broke up with them for a dumb reason. If you've been in this situation, we want to hear from you. What was the dumbest reason why you broke up with someone?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
